entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Port Perry
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:06 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Uxbridge 11:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Temperature: -10.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Wind Chill: -18
Dewpoint: -12.1°C
Wind: ENE 19 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Snow and ice pellet amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of freezing drizzle. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle or ice pellets at times mixed with light snow. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of freezing drizzle. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing drizzle mixed with ice pellets at times mixed with light snow early in the evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
